author: Anonymous Scale
title: Unused function in an encapsulated template?
question: What happens to a function that's part of an encapsulated template that's never called? Is it kept but with (...), or removed? Also, if it's not used, is its type kept in the @template tag?
instructor_answer:
Good question.
If you just comment it out that may make it most clear for readers that it was originally part of the encapsulated templates.  Or you could leave a comment like
    ;; fn-for-foo removed because not used
In either case you should probably comment it out of the @template tag as well.
